info.description:
The VISSIGHTS is a real-time analytics solution to process large amount of
	                        	data and giving visual access to users. The VISSIGHTS API is the gate to the
	                        	processed data for visualization systems.
info.title: VISSIGHTS API Documentation

get.summary: List all publication by a certain author.

parameters.name: authorname
parameters.description: Full name of an author. Example: 'Ben Shneiderman'

200.description: Successful retrieval of publication by a concrete author.

400.description: The author paramter is not valid.

500.description: Selected database does not exist OR Internal Server Error

get.summary: Provides citations to a certain publication

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Key of a concrete entity. Example: 'http://lod.springer.com/data/bookchapter/978-0-230-00093-3_1'

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter by a concrete citation type. Example: 'citedby'

parameters.name: incomming
parameters.description: If flag is 'true' (default), than only citations TO the mentioned document (by key) where listed. To get citations FROM the mentioned document (by key) to another, the flag must be 'false'. Example: 'false'

parameters.name: onlyrefkeys
parameters.description: If the the flag is 'true' (default), only the keys of the referencing documents are listed. If flag is 'false', the referencing documents including major metadata are listed. Example: 'false'

200.description: Successful retrieval of the full meta information to a concrete entity.

500.description: Selected database does not exist OR Internal Server Error

get.summary: Provides all meta-data for to a concrete database entity

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Key of a concrete entity. Example: 'oai:diglib.eg.org:10.2312/VisSym.VisSym04.137-146'

200.description: Successful retrieval of the full meta information to a concrete entity.

500.description: Selected database does not exist OR Internal Server Error

get.summary: Searches for all documents to a mentioned search phrase

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The search phrase that should be queried. Example: 'Visual Analytics'

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Additional list of paramters to precise in which meta information should be searched.

200.description: Successful retrieval of searched publications. To each publication the major meta information are responded.

500.description: Selected database does not exist OR Internal Server Error
